Name: Eakan Gopalakrishnan
AboutMe:
I love the web. But I haven't really worked much on it. I have spent my career so far working on different database technologies doing extract, transform and load and performance optimization, on Linux and OpenVMS operating systems, which include the following:

  • Oracle (everybody knows Oracle).
  • An objected oriented proprietary database technology that treats dimensions of time and currencies as integral part of the database.
  • A key value store based proprietary database technology.
  • SQLite
  • HP's Vertica.
  • SQL Server 2008

And I mostly worked on coding in Object Oriented Perl. Recently though I've moved into web development, and have recently (since Jan 2013) started working on ASP .NET, C#, jQuery, HTML, Entity Framework and MS SQL Server for back-end.
